message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this unique product. I believe it will be of great value to you. My initial offer is $1100000.  I'm confident we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I appreciate your interest. However, $950000 is significantly lower than what I need to accept.  Let's split the difference. I'm willing to come down to $1050000.  This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product to you.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $1050000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll offer $1025000. I believe this is a fair price for the product's value.
